Fields.Name: DropParseLenError
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to parse length errors

Fields.Name: DropHardwareError
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to hardware errors seen

Fields.Name: DropInputMapping
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to missing lookup in input mapping table

Fields.Name: DropMultiDestNotPinnedUplink
Fields.Description: number of multi-destination (multicast) packets dropped because they were not seen on right pinned uplink

Fields.Name: DropFlowHit
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to hitting drop flows

Fields.Name: DropFlowMiss
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to missing a flow-hit

Fields.Name: DropNacl
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to drop-nacl hit

Fields.Name: DropIpsg
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to drop-ipsg hit

Fields.Name: DropIpNormalization
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to IP packet normalization

Fields.Name: DropTcpNormalization
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to TCP normalization

Fields.Name: DropTcpRstWithInvalidAckNum
Fields.Description: number of TCP RST packets dropped due to invalid ACK number

Fields.Name: DropTcpNonSynFirstPkt
Fields.Description: number of TCP non-SYN first packets dropped

Fields.Name: DropIcmpNormalization
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to ICMP packet normalization

Fields.Name: DropInputPropertiesMiss
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to input properties miss

Fields.Name: DropTcpOutOfWindow
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to out-of-window

Fields.Name: DropTcpSplitHandshake
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to split handshake

Fields.Name: DropTcpWinZeroDrop
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to window size being zero

Fields.Name: DropTcpDataAfterFin
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to data received after FIN was seen

Fields.Name: DropTcpNonRstPktAfterRst
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to non-RST seen after RST

Fields.Name: DropTcpInvalidResponderFirstPkt
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to invalid first packet seen from responder

Fields.Name: DropTcpUnexpectedPkt
Fields.Description: number of TCP packets dropped due to unexpected packet seen

Fields.Name: DropSrcLifMismatch
Fields.Description: number of packets dropped due to packets received on unexpected source LIF

Fields.Name: DropIcmpFragPkt
Fields.Description: ICMP/ICMPv6 fragmented packet drops

Fields.Name: DropIpFragPkt
Fields.Description: IP fragmented packet drops
